## polar2 variable

Converts 2D cartesian vector `v` to polar coordinates, i.e. `[r,Î¸]` (angle in radians). See `cartesian()` for reverse operation. If `out` is null, modifies `v` in place.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
polar2: import("@thi.ng/api").Fn2<import("./api").Vec | null, import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, import("./api").Vec>
```
